name: Jade's Ascension
description:
Jade’s Ascension is a local cooperative adventure – arcade game based on Chinese mythology. The players must coordinate themselves to overcome different rooms using common and unique skills from each character to defeat the creatures.

In the faraway land of Mojolonia exists a tradition. When their emperors must leave the throne “Jade’s Ascension” is started, a trial to select the rightful heirs. From every corner of the empire, no matter the origin, the candidates are gathered to continue the dynasty.

With a story mode and an unlockable arcade mode, three pairs very different among themselves will accept the challenge and travel to Jade Tower. Throughout the twenty floors, they will confront a wide variety of challenges, final bosses and mystical creatures where you will discover each pair, as well as their special abilities.

Key features

1-4 player local cooperative
Play alone or with your friends! Choose one of the heirs to make your way to the top and become the emperor.

Three pairs of heirs with unique abilities
Three pairs very different among themselves will travel to Jade Tower. Throughout the twenty floors, they will confront a wide variety of mystical creatures, they will have to solve unexpected challenges quickly and even think about their past to reach a better future.

22 enemies and 6 final bosses
You will encounter around 22 enemies in the different towers and 6 final bosses. Three of them will be basic and appear in all the levels of the game. You must learn how to fight against them, each one with an attack and a special effect. Prepare yourself to defeat the waves and fight against the final boss of each element!

7 different settings based on the elements of nature
The towers are inspired by the elements of Chinese nature. Each one contains two elements that set the story of the characters. Jade Tower, in the arcade mode, is decorated using Chinese ornaments, as well as the jade mineral.

Upgrade your attack skills and life
Upgrade the basic skills of each character to confront the adventure. Qilin offers you all the upgrades to increase the power of your shots and your character’s life.

Multiple power-ups to help you in the game
You can buy several objects to use while fighting. Each one of them has different effects that can help you. Our treasured Pixiu will offer all the available items in its shop.

Arcade mode to reach the highest you can
The arcade game mode has the objective of proceeding with the rounds, while the difficulty increases, for the best score. Don’t stop playing!
